title: Guns and Butter - 2010 June 09 [sebaygo1]
description:
.

Guns and Butter
Wednesday, 09 June 2010

[sebaygo1]



"The Financial Hijacking of America" 

with author, Ellen Brown.  


Brief history of banking; two ways to create money, either publicly or privately; credit creates money and debt; the Federal Reserve; bubbles and crashes; market manipulation; recent changes in banking and accounting rules; securitization; Bank of International Settlements in Basel, Switzerland; the need for state owned banks.



Also see:

"IMF-Style Austerity Comes to America" <a href="
http://www.counterpunch.org/brown03022010.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.counterpunch.org/brown03022010.html</a>

"The Growing Movement for Publicly-Owned Banks" <a href="
http://www.huffingtonpost.com/ellen-brown/the-growing-movement-for_b_504846.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.huffingtonpost.com/ellen-brown/the-growing-movement-for_b_504846.html</a>



:::
[a .pdf copy of Brown's book "Web of Debt" is included with this torrent]
:::



================================================

"Guns & Butter" investigates the relationships among capitalism, militarism and politics. Maintaining a radical perspective in the aftermath of the September 11th attacks, "Guns & Butter: The Economics of Politics" reports on who wins and who loses when the economic resources of civil society are diverted toward global corporatization, war, and the furtherance of a national security state.

================================================

 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
